Text: Thank you for providing these quality torrents. Its amazing how many spammers there are compared to only a couple of uploaders like you who provide true quality. If you look at the HD-section its so flooded with bsrips and other insufferable crap its easy to understand why less accustomed users find it hard to come across proper releases.  Still, its fascinating to see how unpopular these scene releases are in comparison to spam like yifu torrents.
